h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: If you survive the fall, make sure to use the Incense Trail Talisman to quickly warp back to the Shrine instead of having to make the climb yet again.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 3)'.
The content is as follows:
If you survive the fall, make sure to use the Incense Trail Talisman to quickly warp back to the Shrine instead of having to make the climb yet again.
